mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_PRODUCT WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_PRODUCT WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND CATEGORY= #{category}

SELECT PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NM, MAIN_IMG, OPTION_NO, OPTION_NM, PRICE FROM TB_PRODUCT P JOIN TB_PRODUCT_OPTION O USING (PRODUCT_NO) WHERE O.STATUS IN ('Y', 'O') AND P.STATUS = 'Y'
AND CATEGORY = #{category}
AND OPTION_NM LIKE '%${keyword}%' OR PRODUCT_NM LIKE '%${keyword}%'
ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
ORDER BY COUNT DESC
ORDER BY PRICE DESC
ORDER BY PRICE ASC

SELECT PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NM, MAIN_IMG, OPTION_NO, OPTION_NM, PRICE FROM TB_PRODUCT P JOIN TB_PRODUCT_OPTION O USING (PRODUCT_NO) WHERE O.STATUS IN ('Y', 'O') AND P.STATUS = 'Y' AND PRODUCT_NM LIKE '%#{keyword}%' OR OPTION_NM LIKE '%keyword%'

SELECT PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NM, PRODUCT_INFO, DETAIL_INFO, EXTRA_INFO, BRAND_NO, MAIN_IMG, OPTION_NO, OPTION_NM, PRICE FROM TB_PRODUCT JOIN TB_PRODUCT_OPTION O USING (PRODUCT_NO) WHERE O.STATUS IN ('Y', 'O') AND PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}
select TO_CHAR(price, '999,999') from tb_product_option where OPTION_NO = #{optionNo}
SELECT FILE_NAME fileName FROM TB_PRODUCT_IMG WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo} AND STATUS= 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_PRODUCT SET COUNT=COUNT+1 WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}
mapper.select: SELECT BRAND_NO brandNo, BRAND_NAME brandName, BRAND_INTRO brandIntro FROM TB_BRAND WHERE BRAND_NO = ( SELECT BRAND_NO FROM TB_PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo} )
SELECT COUNT(*) reviewNo, ROUND(AVG(STAR_RATE),1) starRate FROM TB_PRODUCT_REVIEW WHERE OPTION_NO IN ( SELECT OPTION_NO FROM TB_PRODUCT_OPTION WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo} )

SELECT REVIEW_NO reviewNo, OPTION_NM "option", REVIEW_TITLE reviewTitle, REVIEW_CONTENT reviewContent, STAR_RATE starRate FROM TB_PRODUCT_REVIEW R JOIN TB_PRODUCT_OPTION USING(OPTION_NO) WHERE R.STATUS='Y' AND OPTION_NO IN ( SELECT OPTION_NO FROM TB_PRODUCT_OPTION WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo} )
SELECT PRODUCT_NO productNo, USER_NO userNo FROM TB_PRODUCT_LIKE WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}
SELECT 'Y' FROM TB_PRODUCT_LIKE WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo} AND USER_NO = #{userNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_PRODUCT_LIKE WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo} AND USER_NO = #{userNo}
mapper.select: SELECT BRAND_NO, BRAND_NAME, PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NM, PRODUCT_INFO, MAIN_IMG, OPTION_NM, OPTION_NO, PRICE, QTY FROM TB_CART_ITEM I JOIN TB_PRODUCT_OPTION O USING(OPTION_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT USING(PRODUCT_NO) JOIN TB_BRAND USING(BRAND_NO) WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND O.STATUS IN ('Y', 'O') ORDER BY ADD_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CART_ITEM( USER_NO, OPTION_NO, QTY ) VALUES ( #{userNo}, #{optionNo}, #{qty} )
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM TB_CART_ITEM WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND OPTION_NO = #{optionNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_CART_ITEM WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND OPTION_NO = #{optionNo}
mapper.select: SELECT OPTION_NO, OPTION_NM, PRICE , PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NM, MAIN_IMG FROM TB_PRODUCT_OPTION JOIN TB_PRODUCT USING(PRODUCT_NO) WHERE OPTION_NO = #{optionNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_KAKAO_READY( PAY_NO , USER_NO , TID) VALUES( SEQ_PAY_NO.NEXTVAL ,#{userNo} ,#{tid} )
mapper.select: SELECT CID, TID, PARTNER_ORDER_ID partnerOrderId, USER_NO userNo FROM TB_KAKAO_READY WHERE PAY_NO = ( SELECT MAX(PAY_NO) FROM TB_KAKAO_READY )
SELECT OPTION_NO optionNo , OPTION_NM optionName , PRICE price FROM TB_PRODUCT_OPTION WHERE OPTION_NO = #{optionNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_ORDER WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT ORDER_NO , ADDRESS_NO , USER_NO , TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD PM HH:MI:SS') , OPTION_NO , OPTION_NM , QTY , PRICE , PRODUCT_NO , PRODUCT_NM , BRAND_NO , BRAND_NAME , MAIN_IMG FROM TB_ORDER JOIN TB_ORDER_ITEM USING(ORDER_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT_OPTION USING(OPTION_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT USING(PRODUCT_NO) JOIN TB_BRAND USING(BRAND_NO) WHERE USER_NO=#{userNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PRODUCT_REVIEW VALUES( SEQ_PRODUCT_RNO.NEXTVAL, #{optionNo}, #{orderNo}, #{reviewTitle}, #{reviewContent}, #{starRate}, DEFAULT, #{originName}, #{changeName} )
